subject: Don't miss this approval  Sun, 06 May 2007 08:09:19 -0800
body:
Dear Homeowner

Are you fed up with paying too much mortgage interest?. You loan has been pre-approved.

You can receive $250,000 for 
$677 per month.

Please respond ASAP.
http://ilook.tw/jgmi



Tim Simon
Home Loan Dept


It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and THEN do your best.	W. Edwards Deming
